Reviews_Description: Very comfortable, best sedan, nice mileage, nice performance, great interior design looks, safety features, etc.

Yes, if you're looking for a Sedan at a low cost you can go on with this car but you'll realize that if you're doing rash driving you won't get that much mileage. If you drive carefully at a low speed, you could get better mileage although this car impressed me in 2018, the grill was too good. This 2022 model is also good lookin...

Overall an attractive car with an attractive road presence. Maintenance might be an issue but it's worth maintaining this car because of its demand and road presence. In terms of safety and engine response.

Verna is one of the best affordable sedans but in process of making it affordable Hyundai cheaps out on not covering the lower floor properly and its insulation. The gearbox and brakes rattling noise if used while on a bumpy road which in turn also causes the wireless apple car play to disconnect. Other than this superb car.

Rating_Title: Overall Best Car In This Segment
Reviews_Description: The best car ever I drove. The luxury feel is awesome and comfortable. Good speed and road grip. Mileage is okay, but not great as it has great features so always not looking for mileage. Overall the best car in this segment.
It is looking nice and is a luxurious feel while travelling. This is too much short a price.
Awesome mileage with a comfortable seat and good design. The engine has the top best quality at affordable prices.
Overall it's a power-packed car with a lot of comforts. A good amount of stability is provided to the owner while driving.
My opinion for this car is very good driving experience is better than City and Ciaz in this range this is the best unit of sedan cars performance is best mileage is also good.
This is a great car with great style and full comfort. The interior looks great. The car gives such a luxury feel which is only felt in luxury cars.
This car's performance is excellent with good safety and looks. Its interior and exterior are also good.
The car features are very good, Finest Car body modification looks good, engine quality also good, mileage is good. It is a family car.
It has a powerful engine and a comfortable suspension. The mileage of the Hyundai Verna diesel is good, and it is the best for city driving and highway also.
The Verna is a great car in terms of mileage, comfort, and speeds on highways. Overall it's a good premium segment car with good performance.
The sitting comfort is good. I can drive Verna very easily, and maintenance cost is in my range. Its dashboard and digital speedometer look very good. Overall experience is very good.

I bought Hyundai Verna facelift automatic and it's the best car in my price segment no other company can offer this kind of facility in this range. Also, the vehicle is smooth and the best to ride. The overall look of the exterior and interior is unmatchable. Safety-wise, it's the best company ever since I bought my car they offer end number o...
The Verna is a great car in terms of its mileage, design, and comfort at this price range. Overall it's a good package of power and performance.

Rating_Title: Verna Sx 1.5 Diesel Best In The Segment
Reviews_Description: I have Verna 1.5 diesel SX best in the segment. It's a rocket pickup, looks like a beast and chilled ac. overall great experience but it should be more spacious in the rear seats
Good-looking and more featured luxury cars fit all types of customers. Mileage is so good and the good thing is that this Verna is with an open sunroof and nice design.
Its amazing features, stylish and sporty look car. It's worth buying and an enjoyable drive. One of the best in the segment.
Verna is the most stylist and premium-looking sedan in this range. It will give good mileage.
This is the best car in the segment. It is comfortable to drive, and its looks and performance are sporty.
Overall a good sedan in diesel variant as there are very few competitors in this segment. Runs smoothly have a powerful pickup and nice stability on the highway.

If you are looking for a sports car, go for it. The best sedan you can buy in this price range. The punch it has is unprecedented. The looks could have been better but looking at the overall product, it's a value for money.
The ride quality, the fuel efficiency, the features, the performance, and the class that this car offers is just mind-boggling at this price range. Simple rules it segments in this budget.

Amazing experience with this dream car for a lot of people. The best inside feel and comfort is next level. Good experience and performance on road slightly may be problematic on village roads and high ridgy roads like farms in the village.

The Verna is the best class sedan. Its powerful engine delivers amazing power, and handling and braking are bliss. Plush interiors always remind us that we are travelling in a premium Sedan car coming with ventilated seats and air conditioning.

Rating_Title: Comfort Is Good But Not Very Great
Reviews_Description: I own this car a few months ago and the mileage is great on the city and highway. The features and styles of this car are superb. The comfort is good not very great, the engine is smooth and performance is the excellent.
Looks, the colour, the style everything is great, a high-performance car. Driving comfort and the no cabin noise performance is great.
Hyundai Verna is a great car in terms of its mileage, design, and comfort at this price range. Overall it's a good package of power, performance and comfort.
